headline: Is Block A Fintech Bargain After a 71.4% Five Year Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether Block is a beaten down fintech bargain or a value trap hiding in plain sight, this breakdown is for you. The stock closed at $65.33 recently, edging up 0.9% over the last week and 5.5% over the past month. It is still down 24.7% year to date and 27.1% over the past year, with a much steeper 71.4% slide over five years. Recent headlines have focused on Block's ongoing push to deepen its ecosystem across Cash App and Square, while regulators and competitors keep...
